description: Event for recording natural or artificial insemination, including embryo transfer.

rank.description: The rank of intervention of each AI carried out within the same reproductive cycle.

sireIdentifiers.description: Unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire, including official ID and Herdbook.

sireOfficialName.description: Official herdbook name of the sire.

sireURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the sire.

straw.description: Details of the straw, which may also include sire details.

eventEndDateTime.description: To be used in case of running with a bull to end the period. ISO8601 date and time. MUST contain time zone. UTC recommended.

semenFromFarmStocks.description: True if the semen is from the farmer's own stocks (false if supplied by technician).

farmContainer.description: Number or ID of the container from which the dose was taken.
